This is by far THE BEST Airbnb! The small details create such a big impact of the appreciation the Flowers have for their rental. From the time you pull into the parking area and see the well cared for plants, seating with a gas fire pit, and the grilling area, you know you can enjoy your trip by just staying "at your new home."
Upon unlocking the door, the cleanliness will be the first eye opening experience. Walls, lightning, furniture, and the kitchen are immaculate. When putting your bags down you will make your way into the kitchen area where numerous breakfast items, chips, nuts, and crackers have been left for you to enjoy.
When packing the fridge, you will be pleasantly surprised to see waters and soft drinks waiting for you to enjoy. In addition, a quick bite meal that can be prepared in the microwave is awaiting in the freezer and a wide variety of coffees, cocoas, and hot teas can be brewed in the Keurig.
A formal "Hello" left in a note asking you to mark your home city on the push pin map is a great conversation piece to see where all past visitors have traveled from.
The bathroom is just precious! The galvanized bucket for the sink, watering can shower, and wooden barn door is such a great utilization of keeping the home's theme running throughout the space. Let me add how wonderful the toiletry items were. They were top notch in getting you clean, pleasant smell, and so refreshing to the hair and skin.....NOT DRYING at all! I would LOVE to find full-size products in this brand!
The bedroom is so comfy! The bed is massive and the mattress is WONDERFUL....."not too soft and not too hard.....it is JUST Right!"
I wish ALL Airbnb owners were required to visit this little slice of heaven in Troy, Alabama before listing their properties. IT IS like no other Airbnb I have stayed in before.....Great job Flower's family for creating a wonderful out of town experience with such clean and inviting accommodations.
